title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
### TOSY Flying Disc: Light Up the Night with Unmatched Fun!

Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc, the ultimate blend of innovation and entertainment designed for night play, freestyle tricks, and classic disc games. Whether you're looking for a unique Christmas gift, a thrilling birthday present, or the perfect camping accessory, the TOSY Flying Disc is here to brighten up your moments with its advanced features and vibrant design.

#### **16 Million Colors, 100x Brighter**
With 36 or 360 high-brightness LEDs, the TOSY Flying Disc is not just another light-up frisbee. It boasts 16 million color options, allowing you to choose the perfect hue to match your mood or the occasion. The LEDs are 100 times brighter than any other light-up flying disc on the market, ensuring that your playtime is always visible, even in the darkest conditions.

#### **Smart Modes and Motion Sensors**
The TOSY Flying Disc comes equipped with smart modes and motion sensors that automatically activate the lights when you throw it. Choose from various brightness levels and timer modes to customize your experience. The motion sensors ensure that the disc lights up as soon as it starts spinning, adding an extra layer of excitement to your games.

#### **Rechargeable and Long-Lasting**
Say goodbye to disposable batteries! The TOSY Flying Disc is rechargeable and includes a USB Type C to C cable for convenient charging. A quick 30-minute charge provides enough power for up to a thousand throws or 90 minutes of continuous play. Whether you're playing a full match or just tossing it around, you'll always have enough juice to keep the fun going.

#### **Professional Quality and Versatility**
Weighing just 175 grams, the TOSY Flying Disc is designed to meet professional ultimate standards. It offers long, straight, and precise flights, making it ideal for a variety of disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes. The comfortable grip ensures that it stays in your hand until you're ready to throw, and its suitability for tricks adds a whole new dimension to your play.

#### **Highly Durable and Waterproof**
Built to last, the TOSY Flying Disc is highly durable and waterproof. It can withstand the rigors of outdoor play and even a dip in the water, ensuring that you can enjoy it in any environment. Whether you're playing on the beach, in the park, or at a campsite, the TOSY Flying Disc is your reliable companion.

#### **The Perfect Gift for Everyone**
The TOSY Flying Disc is a fantastic gift for men, boys, teens, and kids. Its combination of advanced features, vibrant colors, and durable design makes it a hit with all ages. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or just looking for a fun activity to enjoy with friends and family, the TOSY Flying Disc is sure to be a hit.

### **Get Your TOSY Flying Disc Today!**
Elevate your outdoor play with the TOSY Flying Disc. Order now and experience the ultimate in light-up frisbee fun!
